items.sentence: Do you really think somebody would do that?
Aren't you going to tell Tom what Mary did?
Mary's boyfriend is a lot younger than her.
Tom caught more fish than anybody else did.
You seem as if you already know each other.
Which problem should we try to solve first?
This is the first time I've ever seen snow.
I should've had you do that instead of Tom.
I don't think Tom knows a lot about Boston.
I don't think I want to go rowing with Tom.
It's going to be difficult to persuade Tom.
This is a complete distortion of the facts.
This could be considered an act of treason.
My friends think that I'm a very lucky guy.
It's a story that everyone's familiar with.
Tom takes very good care of his belongings.
You're the only one who can make it happen.
My computer's fan is making a lot of noise.
Do you think you can remember the way home?
There's no need for you to be afraid of me.
The train arrived late because of the snow.
Tom has a large walk-in closet in his room.
I wonder if there's anybody here named Tom.
Do you really think that Tom will help you?
You don't need to pretend to be interested.
I told you not to sneak up on me like that.
There's nobody I love more than I love you.
Tom wants to have his cake and eat it, too.
You have no idea how much we've missed you.
Are there any home remedies for bad breath?
Tom was aware that Mary was staring at him.
You didn't just call me a groupie, did you?
I know you probably didn't want to do that.
I'd definitely do that today if I were you.
You can't live on love and fresh air alone.
We should now declare a state of emergency.
Bears like honey just as much as people do.
No one minds being interrupted by applause.
The plant is likely to be closed next week.
We have to hurry, or the stores will close.
How can you eat an enchilada without salsa?
Could you lend me your bike this afternoon?
Tom knows what's worth paying attention to.
Tom and Mary dote on their little baby boy.
Tom is what my father would call a buffoon.
Tom looked at Mary without saying anything.
The weather is perfect to go out for a run.
Sometimes something needs to be sacrificed.
All the children had smiles on their faces.
There wasn't a single person on the street.
